Considering its quality and benefits, I believe it's a great investment for you. To make this opportunity even more enticing, I'm offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $95. Don't miss out on this chance to acquire something truly valuable at a discounted rate. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:

(2) Reject Alice's offer
